requirements.title: SEO audit endpoint performs comprehensive webpage analysis
requirements.description: API endpoint POST /api/v1/seo/audit accepts URL and returns overall score, title analysis, meta tag analysis, content quality metrics, and technical SEO checks with actionable recommendations.

validation.notes: TestAuditEndpoint validates scoring logic and recommendation generation

requirements.title: AI-powered SEO insights via shared Ollama workflow
requirements.description: Integration with initialization/n8n/ollama.json workflow to provide AI-generated content recommendations, semantic analysis, and advanced optimization suggestions.

validation.notes: TestOllamaIntegration verifies workflow invocation and response parsing

requirements.title: PostgreSQL storage for audit history and results
requirements.description: Schema includes SEOAudit and KeywordAnalysis tables with proper relationships. API supports storing audit results and retrieving historical data for tracking improvements.

validation.notes: TestAuditStorage validates CRUD operations and historical queries

requirements.title: Keyword research functionality with volume and difficulty metrics
requirements.description: API endpoint for keyword analysis returns search volume estimates, difficulty scores, and relevance metrics to guide content optimization decisions.

validation.notes: TestKeywordResearch validates volume/difficulty calculation and ranking

requirements.title: Content optimization suggestions based on target keywords
requirements.description: Analysis engine provides specific recommendations for improving content including keyword density, placement, semantic variations, and readability improvements.

validation.notes: TestContentOptimization validates recommendation quality and relevance

requirements.title: Competitor analysis comparing SEO performance
requirements.description: API accepts multiple URLs for comparative analysis, identifying gaps and opportunities relative to competitor pages on similar topics or keywords.

validation.notes: TestCompetitorAnalysis validates multi-URL comparison and gap identification

requirements.title: Redis caching layer for improved performance
requirements.description: Optional Redis integration caches audit results and API responses with graceful fallback to PostgreSQL when Redis is unavailable.

validation.notes: TestRedisCache validates cache hit/miss behavior and fallback logic

requirements.title: Rank tracking over time for target keywords
requirements.description: Historical rank monitoring stores daily/weekly position data for target keywords, enabling trend analysis and performance visualization.

validation.notes: TestRankTracking validates time-series data collection and retrieval

requirements.title: Bulk URL auditing for site-wide SEO assessment
requirements.description: API supports batch processing of multiple URLs in a single request with parallel execution and aggregated reporting for entire websites or sections.

validation.notes: TestBulkAudit validates parallel processing and result aggregation

requirements.title: PDF report generation with visualizations
requirements.description: Report generator creates professional PDF documents with charts, executive summaries, and detailed findings suitable for client or stakeholder presentation.

validation.notes: TestReportGeneration validates PDF creation and content completeness
